name: Fate/Souls 1 (English Ver.)
description:
Game's name: Fate Souls v1.2 (English Version)
Author:遗忘的银灵/Forsaken Silver(Alan Zhang)
Translator:遗忘的银灵/Forsaken Silver(Alan Zhang)

Game description:

Caution: This game was made before the Fate/Bloodborne, and has much less content than Fate/Bloodborne.

This small game is specially made for the celebration of 2018 Chinese new year.

Developing time and budget are quite limited... The scene is quite simple, and my own translation is pretty poor... Please forgive me....
But at least the game's diffculty is similar to the Dark Souls.(*maybe?)
(TIPS: always press the block button)
Mysterious Heroine played the Dark Souls,
She made a dream after that....
Fate + Dark Souls = ?
Thanks for playing this game! Happy 2018 new year!

Keyboard Control：
You can press ESC to quit the game.
wasd：move
shift:sprint
space:roll to doge attack
i:enter the Equipment/Items window
tab:quit the Equipment/Items window
Mouse right：block
Mouse left：weak attack
1:strong attack
Direction keys:(In combat)switch quick slot's equipments/items (In item window)move selection cursor

Console controller:
Left stick: move
Press left stick: sprint
B: roll/ cancel
A: pick up/ climb/ select
BACK: enter the Equipment/Items window
Direction keys:(In combat)switch quick slot's equipments/items (In item window)move selection cursor
LB:block
LT:use item
RB:weak attack
RT:strong attack
